Sentencas: As a novel renewable energy cell type, flat tubular solid oxide fuel cell (FT-SOFC) has the advantages of easy sealing, low resistance, and better stability.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Optimization for fuel cell output performance was traditionally implemented through the combination and comparison of a set of experiments or simulations.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Optimization algorithms are rarely used in the single cell field.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This work contributes to the fuel cell development on performance optimization by combining the numerical simulation with the Nelder-Mead simplex optimization algorithm, where multi-variables are optimized simultaneously.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The numerical model is developed based on the constructed three-dimensional FT-SOFC model which fully couples the chemical and physical processes.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The dependence of cell performance on a variety of operating and structural characteristics is studied, and five strong correlation parameters are selected as decision variables.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Through the simulation-based optimization framework, an optimal combination of these parameters for the maximum power density is obtained.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Compared with the original FT-SOFC, the average current density and average power density of the optimized cell is increased by 10.4% and 9.0%, respectively.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The optimal solution tends to adopt a higher reactant concentration, and a superior proportion of inlet/outlet width is acquired.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In particular, the optimized wide inlet and narrow outlet channel contributes to even current density distribution.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results highlight that the simulation-based optimization has great potential in fuel cell improvements as well as the broad renewable energy application.
Titulo: Numerical simulation and optimization of operating and structural parameters for solid oxide fuel cell
